title: What is an ATS Resume?
content:
What is an ATS Resume?

[What is an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) Resume?]
A resume designed to pass Applicant Tracking System (ATS) software.
Improves your chances of getting noticed by recruiters.
video_desc: Animated graphics showing a resume being scanned by a computer program, highlighting keywords.
narration: "Ever wonder why your resume gets lost in the black hole?  It's probably not getting past the ATS!  This system scans resumes for keywords. An ATS-optimized resume uses those keywords to get you noticed."

title: ATS Resume Keywords
content:
ATS Resume Keywords

[Finding the Right Keywords]
Research job descriptions for common words.
Don't overdo it; keep it natural.
video_desc: Close-up shot of a computer screen showing a job description with highlighted keywords, transitioning to a resume with those same keywords integrated.
narration: "So, how do you beat the system? Find the keywords! Look at job descriptions for common terms, use synonyms, and sprinkle them naturally throughout your resume – don't stuff it!"

title: Formatting for ATS
content:
Formatting for ATS

[Formatting Your ATS Resume]
Stick to standard file types (PDF, DOCX).
video_desc: A split-screen showing a poorly formatted resume next to a clean, well-formatted resume.  The well-formatted resume is highlighted.
narration: "Now for the format. Keep it simple! Avoid fancy fonts, tables, and unusual formatting.  Stick to PDFs or DOCX files for best results."

title: Actionable Tips
content: Tailor your resume to each job.
video_desc: Animated icons representing a checkmark, a magnifying glass, and a pen editing text.
narration: "Finally, tailor your resume to each job, proofread carefully, and use strong action verbs to describe your accomplishments.  Good luck!"
